text: Eliot Spizzirri and Tyler Zink won the Boys' Doubles tennis title at the 2019 US Open, defeating Andrew Paulson and Alexander Zgirovsky in the final, 7–6(7–4), 6–4. Adrian Andreev and Anton Matusevich were the defending champions, but chose not to participate. == Seeds == == Draw == ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== == External links == * Main draw Boys' Doubles US Open, 2019 Boys' Doubles
title: 2019 US Open – Boys' Doubles
